The difference between advice and feedback

The difference between advice and feedback is something I learned from my late father-in-law Bill, a Greek immigrant with no formal education beyond third grade.

Bill had a loud voice and a heavy accent. He got right to the point and was never shy about using profanity to get there. Iâ€™m also pretty sure he spent his 95 years on this Earth having never considered what anyone wanted to hear.
